review: I had visited the hospital and it was chest pain. Treatment was good by doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. I took reports while meeting doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor told to have less food.

We have been going to DR.YVC from 2007. He treated my grand mother for heart issues and now my mother. He is an amazing doctor. Very knowledgeable, very wise and kind. Very patient. My mother who is a heart patient had severe constipation along with breathing issues both were treated very well in less time.
